articles.author: Mohammad Faisal
articles.title: E3 and Omegle to Hyperloop One: Tech products and services that didn’t survive 2023 - News9 LIVE
articles.description: In 2023, several tech products and services ceased operations. These include the Electronic Entertainment Expo (E3), Amazon’s Halo division, Hyperloop One, Lenovo’s Legion gaming phones, the chat platform Omegle, Microsoft WordPad, and Cortana for Windows 11.
articles.content: The year 2023 was marked by the rise of artificial intelligence and generative AI, which made its way to almost every major tech product we use in one or another. We also saw lots of interesting hard… [+5239 chars]
